level.text: The Blind Vendors Committee, as established under Mayor’s Order 77-131, dated August 8, 1977, as amended by Mayor’s Order 78-22, dated January 22, 1978, shall have the following functions:
Actively participate with the Licensing Agency in major administrative decisions and policy and program development decisions affecting the overall administration of the Program;
Receive and transmit to the Department grievances at the request of blind vendors and serve as advocates for vendors in connection with grievances;
Actively participate with the Department in the development and administration of a program system for the transfer and promotion of blind vendors;
Actively participate with the Department in the development of training and retraining programs for blind vendors; and
Sponsor, with the assistance of the Department, meetings and instructional conferences for blind vendors within the Program.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: DCRR Title 6C, as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 27 DCR 4611 (October 17, 1980).
